scenario_text.value: (When we came to...we were outside.)

(Not only that... All the enemies have
disappeared. Not only that...)
...It’s gone.
(All of the fog is gone... The area is calm.)

Um... Everyone here should take a short
break, while I—

Shouldn’t you rest too, Aoi? I bet you’re
tired.

...I’m so happy. I mean, I only have everyone
to look after because they’re all safe.
I see. Thanks as always.

Not at all. Everyone’s spirits were lifted
when you returned. We’d be lost on our own.
So let me thank you again, Takuma.

...Takuma. To be honest, I didn’t think we’d
all make it out in one piece.

It’s thanks to you guys that Miu survived and
I’m safe. I couldn’t have done it on my own.

That’s why, uh, how do I put it... I really
owe the guy holding us all together—you.
...You’ve gotten kinder, Kaito.

Wh—me? Kind?!
You gotta be kidding!!!

(Oh jeez, I never thought I’d see a “cute”
side to Kaito here...)
Takuma... My hands just won’t stop shaking.
...You all right? Don’t push yourself.

Someone could easily have died back there...
Heck, it could’ve been me.
Thinking about it just freaks me out.

Don’t worry, everyone’s fine. Best not to
think about the worst-case scenarios.

Yeah, you’re right. I’ll be careful. I don’t
know what I’d do if any of you disappeared.

Shuuji... I realized something after I came
back here.

It’s been ten days since you left, Takuma.
Have you noticed anything different?

It may be rude of me to say this, but...
you’ve gotten pretty reliable, man.
What?! You...you really think so?

Yeah, you’re way calmer than before. You
worry about us all, but you don’t overdo it.

I-I’m just doing what I have to...! I was
just frantic, I didn’t do anything special...

Anyway, uh, this is no time to let our guard
down! I’ll go check on everyone!
(Shuuji... His expression is more relaxed.)

I hope the park gets rebuilt someday, into a
place where the little ones can live happily.

Yeah, everyone liked the amusement park.
I hope things go well.
Maybe I can be the queen again someday?

When that happens, I appoint thee head guard!
Make sure you always protect me, okay?
Shouldn’t Kaito take that job?

No way! I hate how he’s always nearby.
He’ll be serving food!
(Kaito... I feel a little sorry for him.)

Y’know... The air’s so nice out here tonight.
I mean, the sky’s so beautiful.

It’s been a long time since I’ve seen any of
this place without fog.

I never looked at the sky or plants and
thought how pretty they are.

Who knows, maybe I’m growing as a person or
something, ha ha!

I really think you have, Minoru. You’re a lot
more dependable now. Kinda cool, even.

Hey...hey, quit it, man! You’re embarrassing
me! I ain’t used to that kind of praise.

So Takuma, you went back to our world, right?
And time flowed differently there?

Yeah, I couldn’t believe ten days had passed
back in this world!

Nice! I’ve been hankering for one of the
specials at my favorite hamburger stand!

I want to get back before that special is
taken off the menu! Gotta have goals, ha ha!

The burgers there are amazing, let me tell
you. I’ll treat you to one when we get back!

(Everyone seems hopeful about getting back
home alive after what we just discovered.)

(Yeah, we can all go back. Us, Miyuki...every
one of us!)

(Right! Let’s go find the other Holy
Beasts ASAP!)
